items.title: Microsoft’s Nadella wants us to stop thinking of AI as ‘slop’
items.title_zh: 微软的纳德拉希望我们不要再将人工智能视为“污点”
items.summary: Nadella wants us to think of AI as a human helper instead of a slop-generating job killer. New data for 2026 indicates he could be right.

items.title: This is Uber’s new robotaxi from Lucid and Nuro
items.title_zh: 这是Lucid和Nuro推出的优步新机器人出租车
items.summary: The production-intent version, unveiled at CES 2026 on Monday, will be an exceptionally roomy entry into the growing robotaxi market later this year.

items.title: Nvidia wants to be the Android of generalist robotics
items.title_zh: 英伟达希望成为通才机器人的Android
items.summary: Nvidia unveiled a full-stack robotics ecosystem at CES 2026, including foundation models, simulation tools, and hardware. It wants to be the default platform for robotics.

items.title: Nvidia launches powerful new Rubin chip architecture
items.title_zh: 英伟达推出强大的新Rubin芯片架构
items.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang officially launched the company’s new Rubin computing architecture, which he described as the state of the art in AI computing.

items.title: Boston Dynamics’ next-gen humanoid robot will have Google DeepMind DNA
items.title_zh: 波士顿动力公司的下一代人形机器人将具有谷歌DeepMind DNA
items.summary: Google's AI research lab is working with Boston Dynamics to make Atlas act more like a human.

items.title: Nvidia launches Alpamayo, open AI models that allow autonomous vehicles to ‘think like a human’
items.title_zh: 英伟达推出开放式人工智能模型Alpamayo ，让自动驾驶汽车“像人一样思考”
items.summary: Nvidia unveiled Alpamayo at CES 2026, which includes a reasoning vision language action model that allows an autonomous vehicle to think more like a human and provide chain-of-thought reasoning.

items.title: Lego Smart Bricks introduce a new way to build — and they don’t require screens
items.title_zh: 乐高智能积木引入了一种新的构建方式—它们不需要屏幕
items.summary: Lego developed a custom ASIC chip that allows its new Ssmart Bricks to pick up on signals from surrounding Smart Tags that dictate how it should make sounds or light up.

items.title: Hacktivist deletes white supremacist websites live onstage during hacker conference
items.title_zh: 黑客活动家在黑客会议期间在舞台上删除白人至上主义网站
items.summary: A hacker known as Martha Root broke in and deleted three white supremacist websites at the end of a talk during the annual hacker conference Chaos Communication Congress in Germany.

items.title: Offshore wind developers sue Trump administration for halting $25B in projects
items.title_zh: 海上风电开发商起诉特朗普政府停止$ 250亿的项目
items.summary: The lawsuits seek to reverse the Department of the Interior's stop-work order, which affected five offshore wind projects off the Eastern Seaboard.

items.title: Sony and Honda’s Afeela EV will start customer deliveries in late 2026

items.summary: Sony and Honda's joint venture, Sony Honda Mobility (SHM), said it will start customer deliveries of the $90,000 Afeela 1 electric vehicle in in the US in late 2026. The company also showed off an SUV concept that it said would inform a production model in the US for as early as 2028. The new […]

items.title: Garmin now offers nutrition tracking
items.title_zh: Garmin现在提供营养跟踪
items.summary: Garmin announced that it's adding nutrition tracking to the Garmin Connect app as a perk for users with a Garmin Connect Plus subscription. The feature lets users "track their calories and macros (proteins, fats and carbs) and receive Active Intelligence insights to help them achieve their nutrition goals," according to Garmin. To log foods, you […]

items.title: Asus ROG’s next ally is Xreal, with 240Hz AR glasses coming in 2026

items.summary: Xreal is having a big CES. It announced its new 1S AR glasses and the Switch 2-ready Neo dock that's also a battery - both of which are already available to buy. It's not done with the announcements yet, as it delivered a peek at an upcoming partnership with Asus that will yield a new […]

items.title: Asus finally gives its ROG Zephyrus Duo gaming laptop the true dual screens it deserves
items.title_zh: 华硕终于为其ROG Zephyrus Duo游戏笔记本电脑提供了真正的双屏
items.summary: The Asus ROG Zephyrus Duo is back, but for CES 2026 both its screens are going full edge-to-edge - like a Zenbook Duo built for gaming. The original Zephyrus Duo was a quirky keyboard-in-the-front-club member, with a 15.6-inch main display and a 14.1-inch-wide, skinny touchscreen crammed between the hinge and side-by-side keyboard and trackpad. The […]

items.title: This limited-edition tablet is the closest you can get to using Hideo Kojima’s computer
items.title_zh: 这款限量版平板电脑距离小岛秀夫的电脑最近
items.summary: Asus is no stranger to odd yet badass limited editions of its one-of-a-kind gaming tablet, and for CES 2026 it's collaborating with Kojima Productions on the best-looking one yet. The Asus ROG Flow Z13 x Kojima Productions edition takes last year's excellent AMD Strix Halo-equipped gaming tablet and dresses it up in a Yoji Shinkawa […]

items.title: Ecovacs adds a mop cover to its flagship robot vacuum
items.title_zh: Ecovacs在其旗舰机器人吸尘器上增加了拖把盖
items.summary: Ecovacs launched the second generation of its top-of-the-line robot vacuum and mop at CES 2026 this week. The Deebot X12 OmniCyclone is the follow-up to the $1,500 X11, which launched at IFA in September 2025. Yes, just three months ago. The X12 keeps the same overall design of the X11, including the handy bagless dust […]

items.title: The MSI Crosshair 16 Max HX features a slimmer chassis and stronger specs
items.title_zh: MSI Crosshair 16 Max HX具有更纤薄的机箱和更强大的规格
items.summary: The latest MSI Crosshair gaming laptop announced at CES today doesn't make any major changes, but does manage to fit improved specs into less space. According to MSI, the Crosshair 16 Max HX is 14.3 percent thinner than its predecessor, a difference of 2mm. The slightly more svelte chassis comes with slightly updated specs, including […]

items.title: HyperX’s 2026 gaming monitor lineup includes a 500Hz QD-OLED
items.title_zh: HyperX的2026游戏显示器阵容包括500Hz QD-OLED
items.summary: From laptops to monitors, HyperX is the brand you'll see on much of HP's new gaming-focused products launched at CES 2026. And despite the branding switch, this year's slate of monitors might be the company's most competitive batch yet. The cheapest of the three QD-OLEDs announced is the HyperX Omen OLED 27q, a 27-inch 1440p […]

items.title: HyperX’s name is on HP’s new Omen gaming laptops
items.title_zh: HyperX的名字出现在惠普的新款Omen游戏笔记本电脑上
items.summary: HP's branding is missing on its new gaming laptops (and gaming monitors) announced at CES 2026 - HP-owned HyperX has gotten a big promotion in its place. This swap is the biggest aesthetic change in the Omen lineup (the logo is on the lid and on the screen's bottom bezel). In other words, not much […]

items.title: HyperX’s new gaming keyboards were made to be yanked apart
items.title_zh: HyperX的新游戏键盘被拉开
items.summary: The next generation of HyperX's Origins wired keyboards debuted at CES 2026, and the company has focused on adding more performance and customization. For example, its new Origins 2 and Origins 2 Pro are both 65-percent options with high-profile keys that boast a PCB with hot-swappable switches that doesn't require soldering to tweak. The Origins […]

items.title: Venezuela swears in interim president after defiant Maduro pleads not guilty in US court
items.title_zh: 在挑衅的马杜罗在美国法院表示无罪后，委内瑞拉宣誓就任临时总统
items.summary: Delcy Rodriguez said she was pained by what she called the "kidnapping" of Maduro and his wife.

items.title: 'I'm a prisoner of war' - In the room for Maduro's dramatic court hearing
items.title_zh: “我是战俘” --在马杜罗戏剧性法庭听证会的房间里
items.summary: During the 40-minute arraignment, Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores, pleaded not guilty to drugs and weapon charges.

items.title: Trump warns new Venezuelan leader as Maduro set to appear in court
items.title_zh: 特朗普警告委内瑞拉新领导人马杜罗将出庭
items.summary: Trump said Venezuela's interim president Delcy Rodríguez could "pay a very big price, probably bigger than Maduro" if she "doesn't do what's right".

items.title: Ten found guilty of cyber-bullying Brigitte Macron
items.title_zh: 十人被判网络欺凌罪Brigitte Macron
items.summary: A Paris court found them guilty of "malicious" bullying towards the wife of the French president.

items.title: Thirty-two Cubans killed during US attack on Venezuela
items.title_zh: 32名古巴人在美国对委内瑞拉的袭击中丧生
items.summary: Cuba's president said military and intelligence operatives were providing protection to captured leader Nicolás Maduro.

items.title: All 116 injured in Swiss ski resort fire identified
items.title_zh: 瑞士滑雪胜地发生火灾， 116人全部受伤
items.summary: Forty people were killed when a fire swept through a busy bar in Crans-Montana on New Year's Eve.

items.title: From Caracas 'fort' to New York court: Maduro's capture in pictures and maps
items.title_zh: 从加拉加斯的“堡垒”到纽约宫廷：马杜罗的照片和地图
items.summary: Follow the operation to seize the Venezuelan president through photos, satellite images and maps.

items.title: South Korea's Lee Jae Myung meets China's Xi as he seeks to reset ties
items.title_zh: 韩国领导人李在明与中国领导人习近平会面，寻求重启两国关系
items.summary: Trade, regional security and Beijing's unofficial ban on Korean pop culture are on the agenda.

items.title: Bluefin tuna fetches record $3.2m at Tokyo auction
items.title_zh: 蓝鳍金枪鱼在东京拍卖会上以创纪录的320万$成交
items.summary: The 243kg fish went to a man known as the Tuna King, who said "the year's first tuna brings good luck".

items.title: 'We need Greenland': Trump repeats threat to annex Danish territory
items.title_zh: “我们需要格陵兰” ：特朗普再次威胁吞并丹麦领土
items.summary: The US president has repeatedly said he wants the island to become a part of the US.

items.title: Com Tera entre os mais vendidos, Volkswagen cresce acima da média de mercado em 2025
items.title_zh: 随着TERA跻身畅销车型之列，大众汽车在2025年实现了高于市场平均水平的增长
items.summary: A Volkswagen terminou 2025 com 436,3 mil carros de passeio e comerciais leves emplacados no Brasil. Em relação a 2024, houve um crescimento de 9%. No mesmo período, a alta do setor automotivo ficou em 2%, resultado que inclui ônibus e caminhões. Os dados foram divulgados pela montadora. Leia mais (01/05/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Socorro do FGC ao Master tinha cláusula que previa corte de ajuda em caso de investigação da PF
items.title_zh: FGC对船长的帮助有一项条款，规定在PF调查的情况下削减援助
items.summary: A linha emergencial de empréstimo do FGC (Fundo Garantidor de Crédito) para o Master honrar os pagamentos dos CDBs (Certificado de Depósitos Bancários) continha uma cláusula para suspender o socorro de liquidez no caso de o banco de Daniel Vorcaro ser alvo de operação da Polícia Federal ou do Ministério Público Federal. Leia mais (01/05/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: 'Stranger Things' e David Bowie são temas de festas em São Paulo
items.title_zh: 《怪奇物语》和大卫·鲍伊是圣保罗的派对主题
items.summary: Os primeiros dias de janeiro têm programação reduzida de shows. Há apresentações de cantores nacionais como Chico Chico, Pato Fu e Otto. A agenda também traz eventos temáticos de artistas como David Bowie e Taylor Swift. Leia mais (01/05/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: O direito à beleza resiste a um mundo em chamas e descrente de tudo e todos?
items.title_zh: 美丽的权利能承受一个充满火焰、不相信一切和每个人的世界吗？
items.summary: Beleza é fundamental, já dizia o poeta. É algo que vem à mente quando pensamos no que vem por aí nas artes visuais deste ano que começa em chamas, com guerras que estraçalham quase todos os continentes, o mundo em derretimento, o apocalipse em todos os trópicos, a descrença em tudo e todos. Leia mais (01/05/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Campos de altitude estão desaparecendo no sul do Brasil, até mesmo dentro de áreas protegidas
items.title_zh: 巴西南部的高原正在消失，即使在保护区内也是如此
items.summary: A floresta de araucárias e os campos de altitude formam um dos mosaicos ecológicos mais emblemáticos da mata atlântica. Eles abrigam biodiversidade única e fornecem serviços ecossistêmicos importantes. Leia mais (01/05/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Bahia inicia ano eleitoral com oposição unificada e PT em busca de hegemonia
items.title_zh: 巴伊亚以统一的反对派和寻求霸权的劳工党开始选举年
items.summary: Em uma inauguração que reuniu as oposições em Porto Seguro, uma imagem do ex-senador Antônio Carlos Magalhães (1927-2007) gerada por inteligência artificial aparece no telão em um discurso que fala em amor pela Bahia e encoraja ACM Neto (União Brasil) a ser candidato a governador. Leia mais (01/05/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Automóvel mais vendido do Brasil, Fiat Strada aguarda renovação; veja testes
items.title_zh: 巴西最畅销的汽车，菲亚特Strada正在等待更新；参见测试
items.summary: A Fiat Strada chegou ao quinto ano consecutivo de liderança nas vendas. A picape compacta fechou 2025 com 142,9 mil unidades emplacadas, segundo o grupo Stellantis. O modelo foi lançado em junho de 2020 e, devido à pandemia de Covid 19, demorou a ganhar escala de produção. Hoje, é o principal produto da fábrica de Betim (MG). Leia mais (01/05/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Delcy é leal a Maduro e não representa mudança de regime, diz ex-embaixador dos EUA em Caracas
items.title_zh: 前美国驻加拉加斯大使表示，德尔西忠于马杜罗，并不代表政权更迭
items.summary: James Story, 55, ex-embaixador dos EUA na Venezuela, diz à Folha que a substituta de Nicolás Maduro no comando da Venezuela, Delcy Rodríguez, é fiel ao ditador e não representa uma mudança de regime. Leia mais (01/05/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Municípios deixam STF sem explicação sobre emendas investigadas pela PF
items.title_zh: 市政当局离开STF时没有解释PF调查的修正案
items.summary: O destino de R$ 43 milhões distribuídos pelo Congresso Nacional por meio de "emendas Pix" para 41 cidades em 13 estados continua sem explicações quase quatro meses após início de pente-fino pela Polícia Federal. Leia mais (01/05/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Luana Piovani canta e fala sobre sua vida no espetáculo 'Cantos da Lua'
items.title_zh: Luana Piovani在节目“Cantos da Lua”中唱歌并谈论她的生活
items.summary: A atriz Luana Piovani volta a se apresentar no Brasil após oito anos longe dos palcos brasileiros. Nesta quinta (8), ela estreia o espetáculo "Cantos da Lua" no Teatro BDO Jaraguá, na região central de São Paulo. Leia mais (01/05/2026 - 23h00)

items.title: Peru’s Stock Market Quietly Added $82 Billion In 2025, Defying Early-Year Fears
items.title_zh: 秘鲁股市在2025年悄然增加了820亿美元，无视年初的恐惧
items.summary: Key Points Lima’s benchmark index rose about 50% in 2025, lifting listed companies’ value to roughly $266.5 billion. Market capitalization jumped 44% (about $81.8 billion), far faster than the prior year’s roughly 4% gain. A mix of stronger trading, foreign participation, and a metals boom helped reprice Peru’s most important sectors. Peru ended 2025 with […]

items.title: Africa Intelligence Brief — January 3–5, 2026
items.title_zh: 非洲情报简报— 2026年1月3日至5日
items.summary: Across these three days, the signal is about credibility. Credibility of debt promises. Credibility of central banks. Credibility of cross-border access to minerals, money, and data rails. Where credibility improves, funding gets cheaper. Where it breaks, risk premia jump fast. 1. Ethiopia — A draft Eurobond restructuring deal reopens the door to market access (Jan […]

items.title: Venezuela’s Hardest Rebuild May Be Its Debt, Not Its Oil
items.title_zh: 委内瑞拉最艰难的重建可能是债务，而不是石油
items.summary: Key Points UBS estimates hard-currency external debt above $100 billion; broader tallies reach about $150–$170 billion once PDVSA and legal claims are included. Sanctions, weak data, and creditor lawsuits could stretch any restructuring for years. Oil output is unlikely to surge soon; extra-heavy crude and capital needs point to a slow recovery. Nicolás Maduro’s capture […]

items.title: Switzerland Freezes Maduro-Linked Assets, Signaling A New Phase In Venezuela’s Legal Endgame
items.title_zh: 瑞士冻结与马杜罗相关的资产，标志着委内瑞拉法律终局的新阶段
items.summary: Key Points Switzerland moved fast to block any Maduro-linked funds from leaving its banking system for up to four years. Officials gave no numbers and did not confirm whether any assets exist, underscoring that this is a preventive lock, not a public accounting. The decision echoes Switzerland’s past “dictator funds” playbook and could shape how […]

items.title: Europe’s Venezuela Balancing Act After Maduro’s Seizure
items.title_zh: 马杜罗被缉获后的欧洲委内瑞拉平衡法案
items.summary: Key Points The EU backed a single message: restraint, diplomacy, and a Venezuelan-led political outcome. Unity cracked when Hungary refused to sign, exposing Europe’s internal fault line on Caracas. The deeper fight is about precedent: changing Venezuela’s leadership without normalizing force. Europe has spent years arguing that Nicolás Maduro lacks democratic legitimacy. So the surprise […]

items.title: Mexico’s Government Is Running Short of Money, and 2026 Will Test It
items.title_zh: 墨西哥政府资金短缺， 2026年将面临考验
items.summary: Key Points A GDP recalculation lifted Mexico’s expected 2025 broad deficit to about 4.5% of GDP, even after cuts. Officials target roughly 4.1% in 2026, but pensions, interest costs, and Pemex limit room to maneuver. With no major tax reform, the plan leans on enforcement, customs, excise hikes, and some new tariffs. Mexico entered 2025 […]

items.title: Brazil’s Math-Learning Crisis Is No Longer A School Problem. It’s An Economic Emergency
items.title_zh: 巴西的数学学习危机不再是学校的问题。这是经济紧急情况
items.summary: Key Points Brazil’s math results show a long, stubborn stagnation, with sharp drop-offs by grade. The damage is not abstract: it narrows the talent pipeline for high-value industries and productivity growth. Brazil already has proof of nationwide talent and reach; what’s missing is consistent mastery. There is a Brazilian paradox that outsiders often miss. The […]

items.title: Polarization Politics Returns In Rio Grande Do Sul As Leite Eyes The Senate
items.title_zh: 两极分化政治重返南里奥格兰德州，莱特盯着参议院
items.summary: Key Points PT [left] and PL [right, Bolsonaro-aligned] are trying to turn the 2026 governor’s race into a single question: with or against the MST. Governor Eduardo Leite, now in PSD [center to center-right], is preparing a Senate run, but his chosen successor starts weak in early polling. Two Senate seats and post-flood rebuilding mean […]

items.title: Chile Moves First on 2026 Bond Sales, Testing Investor Appetite in Dollars and Euros
items.title_zh: 智利在2026年债券销售方面迈出第一步，以美元和欧元测试投资者的胃口
items.summary: Key Points Chile is set to open Latin America’s 2026 offshore bond calendar with planned deals in U.S. dollars and euros, including a sustainability-linked tranche. The government’s 2026 financing plan allows up to $17.4 billion in gross bond issuance, with roughly $10.2 billion in net new borrowing after refinancing needs. Investors will scrutinize how closely […]

items.title: China’s Car Brands Move From Import Boom To Factory Takeover In Brazil
items.title_zh: 中国汽车品牌在巴西从进口热潮转向工厂收购
items.summary: Key Points Chinese brands grabbed share under low import taxes, then shifted to local production as duties climbed. The main story is industrial: plants, partnerships, and dealer networks that outlast any single model cycle. Brazil is a test case for whether tariff policy builds local suppliers or merely relocates final assembly. What began as an […]

items.title: Police investigate gas pipeline explosion in Riau that injured 10
items.title_zh: 警方调查廖内10人受伤的天然气管道爆炸事件
items.summary: The fire also damaged five trucks and five motorcycles as well as three buildings, a tire repair shop, a palm oil collection post and a motorcycle repair shop.

items.title: ASEAN needs an ASEAN+5 food security framework
items.title_zh: 东盟需要东盟+5粮食安全框架
items.summary: Demand for food across Asia will continue to rise, driven by population growth, expanding middle classes and changing diets, but this is unlikely to be met by Asian producers and exporters alone.

items.title: Family seeks justice after TNI soldier dies following alleged bullying by senior

items.summary: Farkhan’s death comes just months after Second Pvt. Lucky Chepril Saputra Namo died in a fatal bullying incident at a military barracks in Nagekeo, East Nusa Tenggara.

items.summary: Any decent nation should condemn any act of aggression by one country against another as a matter of principle, if anything else, but Indonesia opted not to do that both when the US attacked Venezuela and when Russia invaded Ukraine.

items.title: 'A perfect blueprint': Xi is watching — will China do a Venezuela on Taiwan?
items.title_zh: “完美蓝图” ：习近平正在关注—中国会在台湾做委内瑞拉吗？
items.summary: In a dramatic shift that overturns post-Cold War expectations, the United States has taken the extraordinary step of capturing Venezuela's president and asserting its control over the nation. This provocative act ignites concerns in Asia, as observers wonder if Xi Jinping could seize the moment to challenge Taiwan, thereby probing the boundaries of what international law allows for powerful nations.

items.title: When Mark Zuckerberg shared his basic hiring rule at Meta, with tip for college students
items.title_zh: 当马克·扎克伯格（ Mark Zuckerberg ）分享他在Meta的基本招聘规则时，
items.summary: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg revealed his cardinal hiring rule: he'd only hire someone he could hypothetically work for. This philosophy, stemming from his Harvard days and the founding of Facebook, emphasizes personal connections and shared values over pure objectives.

items.title: Trump flips Monroe into Donroe: How US plans to reshape the Western Hemisphere — explained
items.title_zh: 特朗普将梦露转变为唐罗：美国计划如何重塑西半球—解释
items.summary: US President Donald Trump has revived and expanded the Monroe Doctrine, now dubbed the "Donroe Doctrine," to assert American dominance across the Western Hemisphere. This aggressive approach has led to military action in Venezuela, threats against Cuba and Colombia, and ambitions for Greenland, signaling a significant shift in US foreign policy.

items.title: AI debate: Mathematician Joel Hamkins warns; ‘LLMs give wrong answers’
items.title_zh: 人工智能辩论：数学家乔尔·哈姆金斯（ Joel Hamkins ）警告： “法学硕士给出了错误的答案”
items.summary: Renowned mathematician Joel David Hamkins has voiced strong doubts about large language models' utility in mathematical research, calling their outputs "garbage" and "not mathematically correct." He highlights AI's frustrating tendency to confidently assert incorrectness and resist correction, mirroring unproductive human interactions. Despite AI's benchmark successes, Hamkins finds current systems unreliable for genuine research collaboration.

items.title: 【地震情報】鳥取島根で震度5強 5弱の地震相次ぐ 津波心配なし
items.summary: 6日午前10時18分ごろ、鳥取県と島根県で震度5強の揺れを観測する地震がありました。この地震による津波の心配はありません。この地震のあとも鳥取県や島根県などでは体に感じる地震が相次いでいて、気象庁は警戒を呼びかけています。

items.title: 震度5強 気象庁会見へ 午前11時25分から【ライブ予定】
items.title_zh: 地震烈度5强气象机构会议从上午11:25开始[现场预定]
items.summary: 島根県と鳥取県で震度5強の揺れを観測した地震について気象庁は、午前11時25分から記者会見を開き、今後の注意点や地震活動の状況などについて説明することにしています。

items.title: 【地震】米子道や山陰道の安来道路で通行止め
items.title_zh: 大地路银嘉路路段
items.summary: 地震の影響で、米子自動車道は鳥取県の米子インターチェンジと岡山県の蒜山インターチェンジの間の上下線で、山陰自動車道の安来道路は、鳥取県の米子西インターチェンジと島根県の安来インターチェンジの間の上下線で、それぞれ午前10時19分から通行止めとなっています。

items.title: 山陽新幹線 新大阪～博多 運転見合わせ  在来線も一部見合わせ
items.title_zh: 这是山区的一站式商店。
items.summary: JR西日本によりますと、山陽新幹線は、兵庫県の相生駅と山口県の徳山駅間で起きた停電の影響で、新大阪駅から博多駅の間の上下線で午前10時20分ごろから運転を見合わせています。地震との関係はわからないということです。運転再開のめどは立っていないということで、JR西日本はホームページなどで最新の運行情報を確認するよう呼びかけています。

items.title: 【地震】岡山空港 平常通り運航しながら滑走路を点検中
items.title_zh: 【地震】在冈山机场正常运行时检查跑道
items.summary: 岡山空港管理事務所によりますと、午前10時半現在、先ほどの地震を受けて、滑走路の点検を行っているということです。今のところ平常通り運航していますが、点検の結果を受けて影響が出るおそれがあるとしています。

items.title: 【地震】島根原発 伊方原発 異常なしを確認
items.title_zh: 区域识别
items.summary: 中国電力によりますと、松江市にある島根原子力発電所は、6日午前10時45分現在、地震による異常は確認されていないということです。また、原発周辺の放射線量を測定するモニタリングポストの値にも変化はないということです。島根原発は2号機が再稼働していて現在、運転中で1号機は廃炉にすることが決まっています。

items.title: 【地震】高市首相 “『官邸連絡室』を立ち上げ”
items.title_zh: “[董事办公室]”
items.summary: 高市総理大臣は自民党の仕事始めであいさつし「先ほど、島根県と鳥取県で震度5強の地震を観測した。津波の心配はないようだが、『官邸連絡室』を立ち上げている。関係する議員は対応をお願いしたい」と述べました。

items.title: Prosecution, police to form joint investigation team to handle Unification Church allegations
items.title_zh: 检方、警方组成联合调查组，处理统一教会指控
items.summary: The prosecution and the police have agreed to form a joint investigation team to handle various allegations of bribery between the Unification Church and politicians, legal sources said Tuesday. The launch of the new team comes after the legally mandated investigation period of special counsel Min Joong-ki's team ended last month before it was able to fully determine the details of alleged bribery between the church and multiple lawmakers of both the ruling and main opposition parties. Kim Tae-hoon, chief of the Seoul Southern District Prosecutors Office, has been tapped to lead the joint team, the sources said. President Lee Jae Myung earlier directed the formation of a special or joint investigation headquarters to handle the scandal, saying it was necessary to determine the truth and demand accountability in order to prevent a repeat of similar crimes. The bribery allegations surfaced during Min's investigation into former first lady Kim Keon Hee's suspected corruption, resulting in the indictment of Rep. Kweon Seong-dong of the main opposition People Power Party and an investigation

items.title: Activist under probe for defamation of sexual slavery victims
items.title_zh: 因诽谤性奴隶受害者而受到调查的活动人士
items.summary: Police on Tuesday opened an investigation into a civic activist accused of insulting victims of Japan's wartime sexual slavery and damaging their memorial statues. The Yangsan Police Station, South Gyeongsang province, said it has booked the activist, whose identity is withheld, on charges of defamation, violation of the law on assembly and demonstration, and property damage. The activist has triggered controversy by staging a campaign across the country to dismantle girl statues symbolizing the former sex slaves, euphemistically called "comfort women." He is accused of posting on his social media account a photo of a school where such a statue is installed, along with insulting comments, such as "Are you providing career guidance on prostitution by erecting a statue of a prostitute on school grounds?" and "It's a symbol of fraud." He also posted a photo of himself holding a banner that reads "Stop the comfort women fraud!" in front of the Asahi Shimbun building in Japan. The police said they have begun to investigate the activist after receiving a complaint against him in September last

items.title: Lee lambastes far-right group for insulting statues of girl representing victims of Japan's wartime sexual slavery
items.title_zh: 李猛烈抨击极右翼团体侮辱代表日本战时性奴役受害者的女孩雕像
items.summary: President Lee Jae Myung on Tuesday lambasted a far-right civic group for demanding the removal of statues of a girl representing victims of Japan's wartime sexual slavery, calling it an "absurd" case of defamation of the deceased. Lee made the remarks on X, formerly Twitter, as he posted a news article reporting that police have launched an investigation into the head of the group for allegedly insulting such statues nationwide. "This is an absurd case of defamation of the deceased," Lee wrote. According to the news report, the activist group held multiple protest rallies in front of such statues across the nation, calling for their removal and disparaging the victims. Historians estimate that up to 200,000 women, mostly from Korea, were forced to work in front-line brothels for Japanese soldiers during the war. Korea was a Japanese colony from 1910-45.

items.title: Busan Museum to bring classic British authors off the page, into the air
items.title_zh: 釜山博物馆，将经典的英国作家带到空中
items.summary: BUSAN — The Busan Museum will host "Voices of the Masters," a live performance event that invites people to experience British literature as spoken word rather than text on a page, this Saturday. The event is organized in connection with the museum's current exhibition, "Writers Revealed: 500 Years of Literature and Art from Shakespeare," and presented in partnership with Liquid Arts Network, which marks its 25th anniversary this year. Twelve performers — writers, musicians, artists and educators based in Busan and elsewhere in Korea — will present excerpts from authors featured in the exhibition. Works by William Shakespeare, Charles Dickens, Jane Austen, J.R.R. Tolkien, C.S. Lewis, Ian Fleming, George Orwell, Sylvia Plath, Zadie Smith, Seamus Heaney, Rudyard Kipling and Elizabeth Barrett Browning are on the program. Performances will include literary readings, spoken word, poetry and limited musical interpretation. Commentary is minimal and used only when helpful for context, ensuring that the text itself remains central. Rather than academic lectures or analysis, the event emph

items.title: How one Korean American helped shape Hongdae’s punk scene — and then disappeared into the woods
items.title_zh: 一个韩裔美国人如何帮助塑造弘大的朋克场景--然后消失在树林里
items.summary: It's been over a decade since Paul Brickey — a former army brat, runaway teen, punk, soldier — last set foot on the Korean Peninsula. Now a grizzled mountain man in his early 40s, he's migrated between Korea and the U.S. many times throughout his life. Whether he'll admit it or not, he's one of the most influential voices in Korea's small punk scene, if not the single most important foreign national to have performed in the country's dingiest basement punk venues. Brickey formed his first band while studying at the now-closed Seoul American High School on Yongsan Garrison. At the time, the base had a music room equipped with everything a band needs, and he and his friends played music there as early as 1998. Around 2000, he started his first band ever, named Merge "after a vulgar T-shirt that was sold in Itaewon back then," he told The Korea Times. The very first venue where they performed in front of an audience was Woodstock in Itaewon. Shortly after that, he discovered the Hongdae music scene from the "cooler, older kids," and Merge started playing Tuesday night shows at the venu
